name: danhunsaker/laravel-flysystem-others
description: Automatically registers every third-party Flysystem adapter it recognizes as a Laravel Filesystem Driver.

suggest.enl/flysystem-cloudinary: One of two options to use the 'cloudinary' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.eqingdan/flysystem-qiniu: One of two options to use the 'qiniu' adapter (^0.1)
suggest.ignited/flysystem-onedrive: One of two options to use the 'onedrive' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.jacekbarecki/flysystem-onedrive: The second of two options to use the 'onedrive' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.litipk/flysystem-fallback-adapter: Required to use the 'fallback' adapter, and with league/flysystem-replicate-adapter, the 'mirror' adapter (^0.1)
suggest.orzcc/aliyun-oss: One of two options to use the 'oss' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.polev/flysystem-qiniu: The second of two options to use the 'qiniu' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.shion/aliyun-oss: The second of two options to use the 'oss' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.t3chnik/flysystem-cloudinary-adapter: The second of two options to use the 'cloudinary' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.twistor/flysystem-stream-wrapper: Allows access to Flysystem drives using 'drive://path' streams (^1.0)
